blog.heading: How to embed Google Form in your website?
description: Embedding a Google Form on your public website is easy. Here are the steps to follow:
Step 1. Create your form and build it.
Step 2. Click on “Send” button on top of form window and a dialog box opned.
Step 3. Copy embed html text and place wherever you would like on your website, and any visitor should be able to fill it out.
